msg_warning_FindInTree_NoLaunchOnFavouri: Find in tree cannot be performed on favorite section and favorite Bookmark Folders.

msg_warning_FindInTree_InvalidDrop.title: Dropped object is not a Bookmark Folder.
msg_warning_FindInTree_InvalidDrop.subtitle: Please drop a Bookmark Root Folder or Bookmark Folder.

msg_warning_expandTotheFindInNode.title: Find in tree cannot be done.
msg_warning_expandTotheFindInNode.subtitle: Expand the tree to that specific Bookmark Folder node
msg_warning_expandTotheFindInNode.message: The Bookmark Folder to find-in is not visible in the tree.

msg_warning_NoObjectsUnderSection.title: Find in tree cannot be done.
msg_warning_NoObjectsUnderSection.subtitle: Expand the Bookmark Folder section to level one.
msg_warning_NoObjectsUnderSection.message: There are no visible Bookmark Folders under the Bookmark Folder section.

msg_warning_NoObjectSelected.title: Find in tree cannot be done.
msg_warning_NoObjectSelected.subtitle: Please select a Bookmark Folder and try again.
msg_warning_NoObjectSelected.message: There is no Bookmark Folder selected to perform Find-In.

msg_info_limitToFindInRootNode: Could not display all search results. Please try different keywords or search from sub Bookmark Folders.
